languages.text: "У тебя уникальный боевой стиль. Как думаешь, я смогу ему обучиться?"
"Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"
languages.original_text: "У тебя уникальный боевой стиль. Как думаешь, я смогу ему обучиться?"

traits.locale_text: "Your martial style is unique. Would you say I can learn to fight as you do?"
"Your martial style is unique. Would you say I can learn to fight as you do?"
"Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?'
"Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?'
"Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"
"Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"

languages.text: «Su estilo de combate es muy peculiar. ¿Cree que podría instruirme en él?».
languages.original_text: "Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"

traits.locale_text: «Su estilo de combate es muy peculiar. ¿Cree que podría instruirme en él?».

languages.text: 「お前の戦闘スタイルは独特だな。私にも身につけられると思うか？」
languages.original_text: "Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の戦闘スタイルは独特だな。私にも身につけられると思うか？」

languages.text: “你的战斗风格非常独特，你觉得我有没有可能学习一下？”
languages.original_text: "Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"

traits.locale_text: “你的战斗风格非常独特，你觉得我有没有可能学习一下？”

languages.text: "Euer Kampfstil ist einzigartig. Denkt Ihr, ich könnte das lernen?"
languages.original_text: "Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"

traits.locale_text: "Euer Kampfstil ist einzigartig. Denkt Ihr, ich könnte das lernen?"

languages.text: « Votre style de combat est unique en son genre. Vous croyez que je pourrais apprendre, moi aussi ? »
languages.original_text: "Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre style de combat est unique en son genre. Vous croyez que je pourrais apprendre, moi aussi ? »

languages.text: "Savaşma tarzının eşini benzerini görmedim. Sence ben de öğrenebilir miyim?"
languages.original_text: "Your fighting style is unique. Do you think it is something I can learn?"
